capability.name: Event Management
capability.definition: Develop the plan for and oversee promotional event activity, including budget and resource management
capability.role: Develop and execute promotional events covering brand development and advertizing. This can include participation in sporting/entertainment events or more general promotional activity
capability.example: Business development reviews market research to select promotional events to sponsor to support the bank brand and enhance market awareness

key_features.name: Track market/competitor activity in promotional events
key_features.description: Enables track market/competitor activity in promotional events to support develop the plan for and oversee promotional event activity, including budget and resource management

key_features.name: Assess fit of promotional event sponsorship opportunities
key_features.description: Enables assess fit of promotional event sponsorship opportunities to support develop the plan for and oversee promotional event activity, including budget and resource management

key_features.name: Direct the participation in promotional events
key_features.description: Enables direct the participation in promotional events to support develop the plan for and oversee promotional event activity, including budget and resource management
